function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adequate natural light in living spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to the presence of dust and virus particles","Mitigation":"Ensure proper provision of natural light in living spaces","Technologies":"Smart windows, daylight redirection systems","People":"Residents of buildings with inadequate natural light","Owner":"Architects, building designers, homeowners"},{"Description":"Rapid transmission risk of COVID-19 in built environments","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement adaptive design strategies to address the transmission risk, such as flexible spaces and improved ventilation","Technologies":"Flexible partition systems, UV-C disinfection, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"Architects, building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of defined or organized space for remote work and study","Impact":"Difficulty for people to effectively work and study from home, increasing the potential for mental stress and reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Incorporate designated work/study spaces in home design or adapt existing spaces for work/study purposes","Technologies":"Furniture with integrated work surfaces, soundproofing materials","People":"Remote workers, students studying from home","Owner":"Homeowners, property developers, interior designers"}]}
